mapper.sql: customer.customerId AS customerId, customer.firstName AS firstName, customer.lastName AS lastName, customer.phoneNumber AS phoneNumber, customer.streetAddress AS streetAddress, customer.zipCode AS zipCode, customer.balance AS balance
mapper.update: UPDATE dbo.customers SET firstName = #{firstName}, lastName = #{lastName}, phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}, streetAddress = #{streetAddress}, zipCode = #{zipCode}, balance = #{balance} WHERE customerId = #{customerId}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM dbo.rentals as rental JOIN dbo.customers as customer ON rental.rentalCustomerId = customer.customerId WHERE customer.customerId = #{customerId}
SELECT FROM dbo.rentals as rental JOIN dbo.customers as customer ON rental.rentalCustomerId = customer.customerId WHERE customer.customerId = #{customerId} AND rental.returnedDate IS NULL
